Articles.Content:
When I'm on the challenges page, I've wanted to see new challenges. But it's often crowded with other posts from other challenges which I've seen before. I don't particularly want to see things that have been replied to recently, I want to see new stuff! But others may disagree and want 'most recent post/reply' thing, so I thought "filters?" and here is the suggestion. Should this be in the suggestion bit or am I in the right place?

Anyway, can the forum get a way to filter posts? You could have newest to oldest, for example. There could be other things you want, like word count in a post (higher word counts in the challenges section usually mean more quality about the challenge).
If you scroll down in the forum you'll see an options bar that will allow you to do exactly that
